item.title: Marguerite add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Marguerite add a quote by Audre Lorde
item.description: "My silences had not protected me. Your silence will not protect you. But for every real word spoken, for every attempt I had ever made to speak those truths for which I am still seeking, I had made contact with other women while we examined the words to fit a world in which we all believed, bridging our differences." -- Audre Lorde

item.title: Marguerite add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "Their mothers had finally caught up to them and been proven right. There were consequences after all but they were the consequences to things you didn't even know you'd done." -- Margaret Atwood
